title: 3 and Out - Tua TNF Scare, Week 4 3 for the $$ Picks
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Tua TNF Scare, Week 4 3 for the $$ Picks
description:
John reacts to the sobering sight of Tua Tagovailoa being carted off the field against the Bengals, and if it’s fair to call the Dolphins medical staff into question. He also discusses why the 2021 QB draft class is looking historically disappointing, and under which circumstances he supports fans booing returning former players or coaches.

Finally, John runs 3 of his Week 4 NFL picks by Action Network sharp Stuckey to see if there's professional agreement or disagreement! 

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always FanDuel for the best wagering action! #volume #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
